title: Document Verification
subtitle: Verify the authenticity and integrity of your documents using our blockchain-powered verification system. Upload a PDF document to check if it exists in our secure database and view its complete signing history.
form.uploadDescription: Select a PDF file (max 500MB) to verify its authenticity and integrity
results.title: Verification Results
results.hashDescription: This unique hash identifies your document and ensures its integrity
document.title: Document Title
notFound.title: This document was not found in our system. This could mean:
notFound.reason1: The document has not been uploaded to BlockSign
notFound.reason2: The document has been modified since it was uploaded
notFound.reason3: The document was deleted from the system
info.title: How it works
info.description: Upload a PDF document to verify its authenticity. Our system calculates a SHA-256 hash of your document and compares it against our secure database. If a match is found, you'll see the complete document history including all signatures and participants.
toast.notFound: Document not found in the system
